Item.Name: Iron Anvil
Item.ToolTip: Used to craft items from metal bars

Item.Name: Magic Mirror
Item.ToolTip: Gaze in the mirror to return home

Item.Name: Cloud in a Bottle
Item.ToolTip: Allows the holder to double jump

Item.Name: Hermes Boots
Item.ToolTip: The wearer can run super fast

Item.Name: Starfury
Item.ToolTip: Causes stars to rain from the sky

Item.Name: Orb of Light
Item.ToolTip: Creates a magical orb of light

Item.Name: Water Candle
Item.ToolTip: Holding this may attract unwanted attention

Item.Name: Aqua Scepter
Item.ToolTip: Sprays out a shower of water

Item.Name: Water Bolt
Item.ToolTip: Casts a slow moving bolt of water

Item.Name: Bomb
Item.ToolTip: A small explosion that will destroy some tiles

Item.Name: Dynamite
Item.ToolTip: A large explosion that will destroy most tiles

Item.Name: Grenade
Item.ToolTip: A small explosion that will not destroy tiles

Item.Name: Flamelash
Item.ToolTip: Summons a controllable ball of fire

Item.Name: Goldfish
Item.ToolTip: 'It's smiling, might be a good snack'

Item.Name: Blowpipe
Item.ToolTip: Allows the collection of seeds for ammo

Item.Name: Spelunker Potion
Item.ToolTip: Shows the location of treasure and ore

Item.Name: Water Walking Potion
Item.ToolTip: Allows the ability to walk on water
